name: DodoSavior
description:
DodoSavior is a 2D adventure game with levels of increasing difficulty. Out hero is an environmental hippie whose mission is to save Dodo, an endangered species, from extinction. Dodos are not so smart nor they can look after themselves. The only way to avoid their extinction is to help them reach a nature reserve where they will be safe.

Controls:
- WASD or ARROW KEYS to move.
- "X" to catch Dodo (and Stones).
- Long press "C" to throw dodo in the national reserve.
- "M" to mute/unmute.

Game made with Stencyl in 72 hours for LudumDare46. Theme: Keep it alive.
Sound effects made with Audacity, Bfxr and Freesound.org.
Background music from PlayOnLoop.com (Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0).
